frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Kubecon EU
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering focused on End Users will be held on May 4th in Central European Summer Time (CEST).
frontmatter.info_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering at KubeCon EU, will focus on talks from end users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases and lessons learned. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and future technologies.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: Please note: Pre-Registration is Required and the Gathering will be held on Central European Summer Time (CEST).

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential
Enabling Innovation Everywhere: Red Hat's Hybrid Multi-Cloud Road Map and OpenShift Release Update
Kubernetes as the Control Plane for the Hybrid Cloud
Streamlining the OpenShift Developer Experience by Building an Enterprise Helm Chart Repository
End to End OCP 4 clusters deployment automation in IT context
ODCN’s journey to connecting OpenShift clusters securely and transparently with Submariner
Cost and Resource management of Modern CI/CD Infrastructure with OpenShift
Using Text Analytics and AI to reduce GDPR risk)
Banking App Modernization via the IBM Cloud Pak for Automation on OpenShift Container Platform
Rohde & Schwarz's Journey to OpenShift 4:From OKD to ARO (Azure Red Hat OpenShift)
Lessons Learned Adopting RHEL Container Tools: Podman, Buildah, Quay, Skopeo, Clair and S2I
HealthOS: Enabling Standards-Based Healthcare Interoperability with Cloud Native and Zero Trust
